title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the SuccessionPlanningPro tool.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the database schema, backend services, frontend components, security considerations, and deployment strategy. This design should be scalable, secure, and efficient to support the requirements of a comprehensive tool for identifying and developing potential future leaders within the organization.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing employee data, performance evaluations, and succession planning information.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services for managing employee data, performance evaluations, and succession planning workflows.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for the SuccessionPlanningPro tool, including dashboards, forms, and reporting capabilities.

title: Security and Access Control - REVISED
description: Implement robust security measures including multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, data encryption (at rest and in transit), secure data storage, and secure user session management. Additionally, implement audit logging for tracking changes and actions within the system, and consider integrating SSO (Single Sign-On) for seamless user experience. To ensure compliance with privacy regulations, implement Data Protection Officers' (DPOs) recommendations where necessary.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the backend, frontend, and database components, and perform comprehensive testing to ensure the application meets the specified requirements.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and prepare for the application's release.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for administrators and end-users, and develop training materials to ensure smooth adoption of the SuccessionPlanningPro tool.
